flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3200>>3200 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3200-1200=<<3200-1200=20000>>20000 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 20000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
